title: 128B.04 RESIDENT PUPILS.
text: A pupil in kindergarten through 8th grade who resides within former Independent School District No. 25 is a resident pupil for the purposes of chapters 120A, 123B, 124D, 125A, and 125B. Pupils enrolled in the school may not be counted by Independent School District No. 309 for the purposes of receiving revenue according to chapters 120A to 129C.
